levels.description: RES <@ba.vup>+{magic_resistance}</>. Attacks now lock on to a target, dealing <@ba.vup>{attack@atk_scale_base:0%}</> ATK as Arts damage every <@ba.vup>{attack@cooldown}</>s. When against the same target, gradually increases damage up to a maximum of <@ba.vup>3</>x and gradually reduces its Movement Speed to up to <@ba.vup>40%</> (max effect reached after 5s). The locked-on target and the effects are reset when the skill is interrupted, or when the target is defeated.
